explanation: [0-0] On a wooden countertop in the kitchen, a wooden bowl is filled with minced meat. A pair of hands reaches in from the left, with the right hand holding a piece of minced meat and the left hand holding a green plate. On the plate are four meatballs. Above the countertop, a red pot is filled with boiling water, with several stovetop buttons visible. In the lower right corner, a red and white checkered cloth is partially visible.
[0-3] First, a right hand quickly squeezes meatballs onto the plate. Then, a left hand holds the green plate full of meatballs and pours them into the pot.

[3-12] The scene then switches to the wooden countertop, where a red and white checkered cloth is partially visible. A left hand places a purple eggplant on a green cutting board. A right hand, holding a knife, removes the top and bottom of the eggplant and places it vertically on the cutting board. A pair of hands then places a metal slicer over the eggplant and presses it down. The hands then spread the sliced eggplant apart, leaving only the core in the center of the slicer. The hands pick up the sliced eggplant and move to the left.

[12-18] The scene changes again, showing a white food processor on the wooden countertop. A woman in a green apron stands in front of the countertop. [18-28] The food processor stops, and the camera zooms out. A left hand pours the powder from the food processor onto the wooden cutting board. The right hand holds an egg and presses it into the pile of powder, creating a small well.
